title: People to play with?
body:
Ive come to the point where i play with almost no one and i just play ranks all the time with no fun and i wanted to know if there is a welcoming group that wouldn't mind a +1 a fun group with no flame :) 
I'm platinum 3 and i hate flaming as well. 
#LonelyLife

replies.body: I'd be keen to play with you, but we are all Silver :3 so if you don't mind scrub then add me :P
